Dataloom Utilities
++++++++++++++++++

Dataloom comes up with some utility functions that works on an instance of a model. This is very useful when ``debuging`` your tables to see how do they look like. These function include:

#. `inspect <inspect.html>`_ 
#. `decorators <decorators.html>`_ 
#. `count <count.html>`_ 
#. `min <min.html>`_ 
#. `max <max.html>`_ 
#. `avg <avg.html>`_ 
#. `sum <sum.html>`_ 



.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :hidden:

   inspect
   decorators
   count
   min
   max
   avg
   sum
